item.title: Tesla's Autopilot keeps causing its cars to crash
item.description: Tesla is facing heat from federal officers following yet another fatal accident keen Autopilot. The National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) currently found that Tesla’s semi-self ample riding feature turned into in part accountable in a 2018 fatal automobile break, adding yet yet another accident to the expertise’s already worrisome myth.
